basics.name: Andre Huaman Yovera
basics.label: Computer Engineer | Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: I am a Software Engineer with 5 years of professional experience in developing technological solutions, specialized in .NET, clean architectures and automated testing. During this time I have worked in more than 5 software companies and currently develop end-to-end systems applying good architecture, testing and deployment practices. I am passionate about research and the challenge of applying emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, blockchain and data science.

work.name: R y M Ingenieros SAC
work.position: Senior Software Engineer | Mobile and Web Systems Development
work.summary: Currently leading the development of technological solutions for RYM Engineers, covering projects in Peru and Panama. Complete development of Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru, using .NET Core, .NET MAUI and Xamarin, including scalable architecture design, intuitive interfaces, geolocation, maps and route and fare algorithms. Development of REST APIs with .NET Core and Node.js for service integration.
highlights: Complete development of Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru using .NET Core and .NET MAUI
Development of REST APIs with Node.js and .NET Core for service integration
Implementation of Python solutions for data analysis and route algorithms
Research and development of systems for the hotel sector in Panama
Design and development of systems for the shipping and port sector in Panama
Comprehensive technological project management with agile methodologies

work.name: AmazonTI
work.summary: As a Software Engineer at AmazonTI, I lead development initiatives within a company specialized in IT infrastructure. Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET Core, Node.js and Python to complement the company's infrastructure services. Implementation of REST APIs and microservices.
highlights: Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET Core and Node.js
Implementation of REST APIs with Python (Flask/Django) and .NET Core
Implementation of customized software solutions for corporate clients
Creation of data analysis and web scraping tools with Python
Participation in the expansion of the software development division

work.name: EVENTECH SpA
work.summary: I led the technology strategy and actively participated in software development as a technology consultant. Planning and architecture of comprehensive technological solutions using .NET Core, Node.js and Python. Implementation of solutions based on artificial intelligence and data science with Python and REST APIs.
highlights: Planning and architecture of comprehensive technological solutions using .NET Core, Node.js and Python
Implementation of solutions based on artificial intelligence and data science with Python
Development of REST APIs with .NET Core and Node.js for service integration
Cybersecurity and ethical hacking services for companies
Creation of innovative technological products for CORFO and SERCOTEC fund applications

work.name: ONEUP
work.summary: I participated in the development of comprehensive technological solutions for important companies in the aviation and retail sector. Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET Core, Node.js, Python (Flask/Django) and ASP.NET technologies. Implementation of REST APIs and microservices.
highlights: Development of web, mobile and desktop applications using .NET Core, Node.js, Python and ASP.NET
Implementation of REST APIs with .NET Core and Node.js for e-commerce systems
Development of web scraping solutions with Python for strategic data collection
Implementation of microservices with Python (Flask/Django) and .NET Core
Integration with SAP systems for business management

work.name: R y M Ingenieros SAC
work.summary: As a Software Engineer at RYM, I led the development of an innovative Uber-like mobile application for motorcycle taxis in Peru using .NET Core and .NET MAUI, representing the company's first significant technological project. Development of REST APIs with Node.js and Python for service integration.
highlights: Complete development of mobile application using .NET Core and .NET MAUI (Xamarin) technologies
Development of REST APIs with Node.js and Python for service integration
Design and implementation of scalable software architecture
Integration of geolocation and mapping systems
Development of algorithms for route and fare calculation with Python

projects.name: RestaurantePro - Comprehensive Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Complete restaurant management system developed with modern Microsoft technologies (.NET 9). Includes 3 specialized applications: mobile app (.NET MAUI), administrative web (Blazor) and public web (Blazor).

projects.name: VetCarePro - Comprehensive Veterinary Management System
projects.description: Enterprise system for comprehensive veterinary clinic management, focused on optimizing processes and improving the experience of both medical staff and clients. Includes patient management, inventory control, automatic reminders and integrated POS.

projects.name: Atsa Airlines
projects.description: Flight ticket sales platform with complete e-commerce system.

projects.name: eFTR StarPeru
projects.description: Aircraft flight logbook system with native mobile application.

projects.name: Vamo.Pe - Motorcycle Taxi Application
projects.description: Uber-like application for motorcycle taxis in Lima with geolocation, maps and route and fare algorithms.

projects.name: Care4U - Early Diagnosis App with AI
projects.description: Health mobile app using AI for early diagnosis. Users input symptoms and receive medical specialist suggestions. Developed with Python, Flask and React Native.

projects.name: Pharmacy Data Web Scraping System
projects.description: Automated system for collecting pharmacy data from websites with data analysis.
